messages.content: I mean, they did just that in Djibouti I believe, and Sri Lanka before. Hopefully Kenya can avoid the debt trap
Let's hope January treats us a little better than December.
I hope everyone has a nice day.
He’s gone soon I would imagine, hope we can get a late-mid round pick for him, like a 5th
I hope your daughter gets the help she needs and someday gets better.
Yeah you better hope. I just switched to combat pro from standard and I gotta say my builds are 🗿
[NAME], [NAME] is starting a marriage with infidelity and drunk proposals. I hope a happy and long married life for him.
I have more faith in [NAME] than anyone on the court to make a 3. Strange world
Has any news been confirmed of whose playing [NAME]. I hope we see him soon to grasp how charasmatic he can be
Break ups are hard. Hope you feel better.
Wow. That was deep. I hope you make out well move on and find true love. Be strong
People have gotten triggered on this sub the past month if you didn't call [NAME] a [NAME], so I think we can handle it.
This... This is where my journey ends. I was not able to make it to the end, good luck future redditors!
If the cops arrested him, he must be guilty! (Good luck!! You got this!)
im done with my break im going to make more i promise
I believe that you can search for providers here. Good luck and good on ya.
The miracle was just that. Because we all know the Vikings would fail the next game.
Oh I'd wager it was as addictive :-) 7x70's :-/

Bide your time, keep your eyes open, and build the reputation and relationship needed. The opportunity will come.
